name: EARTH A2A Swarm
description: A2A World | E.A.R.T.H. is a dynamic Multi-Agent System (MAS) built on the official Agent-to-Agent (A2A) Protocol. The platform is powered by Gemini 3 Pro, acting as a high-level "Connoisseur" that analyzes research queries and identifies required disciplinary expertise from a swarm of specialized subagents.
